descriptionHtml:
My first quest I have made. It is a pretty simple quest. To start the quest go to the bannered mare and talk to Halgar the Huntsman.
<br />
<br />The quest is about helping a man named Halgar who got robbed in the woods by a thief named Brutus, after you go to Robber's Gorge and kill Brutus and get his hunting bow back you return to The Bannered Mare in Whiterun and give it to Halgar he will give you the sword Brutus dropped while running away from Halgar.
<br />
<br />HOPE YOU ENJOY!!!!!!
author: Chilipanda2
